attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The news today 11th July 2008, six people stabbed, 5 dead and 1 fighting for their lives.  All in a space of 24 hours.

This petition is urging the Prime Minister to incur tougher sentences on the perpetrators of such crimes.  

This country is going to pieces and unless something is done about it, it will only get worse.

The sentence never fits the crime here, we are way to soft, its time to toughen up.

How many more families have to go through the heartbreak of losing a loved one, parents are outliving their children in this violent country, we are going backwards not forwards, its time to make a stance.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
